Welcome to Black Rock Yoga-Pilates

Our mission is to help you experience the physical and mental benefits from taking weekly pilates/yoga practise. Gaining strength and confidence by creating a happier, healthier you. Whether you’re a complete beginner or have taken part regularly, Black Rock Pilates&Yoga welcomes you to join a feel good class. Pilates in The New Forest, Hampshire. Welcoming clients from across the World. Unlike a gym workout, it doesn’t require a lot of home gym equipment all you will need is a mat and a free space. Strengthening and lengthening your muscles with low-impact resistance training are just a few benefits.

Discover a practise through

MIND BODY SOUL

Services available

Pilates Classes

Our hugely popular classes employ the principle of pilates in a series of challenging and rewarding workouts. Our general pilates classes are designed to inspire you towards a healthier body and mind, through challenging workouts built around the established principles of pilates. By utilising these principles, we’ll help you find a whole new level of strength, fitness, and confidence. If you’re new to fitness or you’re looking to improve your mobility, this is the perfect class for you. We’ll focus on flexibility, balance, and strength in a class that moves slowly to really focus on good form and healthy movement.

Reformer Pilates

There are so many reasons to love Reformer pilates, but the #1 reason has to be its versatility; Reformer Pilates delivers so many different benefits to different people. Whether it’s a precision strength training workout, stretching and toning, a sweat-free full-body workout (yes, really) or just a sense of belonging and community, Reformer can support your fitness goals in many different ways. We’re here for it all, and you’re invited!

Yoga Classes

Black Rock Yoga offers In Person and Online Yoga Classes across Southampton, Hampshire. There are two types of yoga classes. Hatha yoga, one of these classes, builds strength, flexbilty and creates a sense of calm throughout your whole being. A typical class will be relatively gentle, slow and good for beginners. This practice typically starts with some gentle warm-ups, continues to a sequence of poses, and end with 5-10 minutes of relaxation in corpse pose. Other class are Vinyasa Flow Yoga, which is a dynamic and sometimes challenging style of yoga which will strengthen and relax both body and mind. Vinyasa Flow yoga classes are open to both beginners and experienced students of yoga.

TRX and Weights

TRX pilates introduces resistance bands into our gentle pilates routines, building lean muscle and improving balance through your own bodyweight resistance. It’s a fun, low impact class that challenges the body and mind.

Guided Meditation

Lead by expert tutors, our guided meditation sessions will help you find stillness in the midst of your busy and demanding day. Take some time to join us for a guided reset that focuses on breathing and inner calm

Online Pilates&Yoga Classes

Keep your options open when you are not able to attend a class or don’t live local you are able to participate! All the convenience of working out at home, but with a fitness specialist motivating & supporting you. Expect intelligent training, a calm, fun atmosphere and real results, both mental & physical.

What to expect from class

Not all pilates&yoga classes are the same, experience a unique and transformative approach to pilates&yoga. Challenge your body and mind through a dynamic selection of exercises and be relieved through stretches and relaxation. Get indivdual progressions and attention leaving you feeling more confident and stronger after every class. Whether you’re a complete beginner or having being practising for years. Pilates&Yoga is for all bodies and you are always welcome to join Black Rock Pilates&Yoga.
